seo.title: Nicolas Grignard | Front-end developer
seo.description: Portfolio of Nicolas Grignard, front-end developer. Projects, skills, approach, and contact.

hero.name: Nicolas Grignard
hero.title: Front-end developer
intro: I build clear, accessible web interfaces that solve real needs.
I pay close attention to readability and long-term maintainability.

approach.title: My approach
paragraphs: I build interfaces by starting with the problem to solve. I move step by step, aiming to understand the project's logic, constraints, and use cases before making technical choices.
My approach evolves with each project. I explore, iterate, and focus on producing readable, structured, maintainable code designed to last.

projects.title: My projects
intro: A selection of projects completed during training and beyond, grouped by theme.
Each category gathers work that reflects real-world problems, technical choices, and progression in my practice.

html-css.title: HTML - CSS
html-css.description: Building responsive interfaces from mockups, with attention to structure, visual accuracy, and accessibility.
html-css.alt: Thumbnail for the HTML - CSS category

javascript.title: JavaScript
javascript.description: Dynamic web pages, DOM manipulation, user interactions, and communication with APIs.

react.title: React
react.description: Front-end apps structured with components, state management, routing, and scalable code organization.

optimization.title: Project management & optimization
optimization.description: Needs analysis, planning, debugging, performance improvements, accessibility, and overall code quality.
optimization.alt: Thumbnail for the Project management & optimization category

personal.title: Personal projects
personal.description: Projects outside the training scope, often more experimental, mixing technical challenges, real constraints, and practical usage.
personal.alt: Thumbnail for the Personal projects category

ohmyfood.title: Ohmyfood
description: Full integration of a showcase site from provided mockups.
The project focuses on HTML structure, Sass usage, CSS animations, and adaptation to different screen sizes.
It helped me reinforce solid integration practices and improve code readability on a mid-sized project.

booki.title: Booki
description: Integration of a responsive web page from a desktop mockup, with tablet and mobile adaptation.
The project relies on a clear semantic HTML structure and Flexbox for layout.
It provides a solid base for understanding responsive constraints and organizing a simple yet complete interface.

sophie-bluel.title: Sophie Bluel - Interior Designer
description: Development of a dynamic web interface in vanilla JavaScript.
The project focuses on DOM manipulation, user interaction handling, and API communication to display and update data.
It helped me structure front-end logic and better understand state management without a framework.

kasa.title: Kasa
description: Development of a React front-end application based on mockups and provided data.
The project implements component architecture, state management, routing, and code organization at app scale.
It marks a step change in how I structure applications and think about maintainability.

argent-bank.title: Argent Bank
description: Development of a front-end banking app with React and Redux.
Global state management, access security, and API communication.
This project helped me understand data centralization challenges and structuring a more complex application.

menu-maker-qwenta.title: Menu Maker by Qwenta
description: A project focused on the early phase of web development.
Client needs analysis, technical specs writing, Kanban workflow organization, and task prioritization.
It helped me approach scoping and project management before the development phase.

724events.title: 724Events
description: Analysis and correction of issues on an existing event website.
Work focused on bug identification, performance improvements, accessibility, and SEO fixes.
This project taught me to work methodically on existing code without unnecessary rewrites.

nina-carducci.title: Nina Carducci - Photographer
description: Optimization of an existing website focused on performance and SEO.
Work included SEO improvements, image optimization, overall performance, and accessibility.
It helped me understand the real impact of technical optimizations on visibility and user experience.

mk-gp-experience.title: MK GP Experience
description: Web app developed to support a live event on Twitch.
Dynamic interface, real-time data handling, stream overlays, and complex front-end logic.
An experimental project designed for real use with real-world constraints.

skills.title: Skills
intro: Click on the boxes to see the skills used in each category.

blocks.title: Turn a mockup into a reliable interface
Stabilize and improve an existing project

contact.title: Contact
subtitle: A question, a proposal, or a collaboration?
I'll get back to you quickly.

form.messagePlaceholder: Feel free to describe your request in detail
